short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful extension designed to help you stay present and maintain productivity while on the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For people with ADHD, hyperactivity and people who have a difficulty to focus on one tasks, Punctuate is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help you stay present and maintain productivity while browsing the web. It offers a unique set of features to create a focused and distraction-free browsing experience.
